heading: Ewe napanapen efeiochun ewe wain ren sakrament a awewetiw. Arap ngeni Ierin ewe Samon 401–421.

verses.txt: Ewe napanapen efeiochun ewe wain—Nengeni, ra angei ewe kap, me apasa:

O Kot, Samach mi Napanap, sia tingor ngonuk, fan iten Noum we Jises Kraist, om kopwene efeiochu me epinano ei wain ngeni aionen meinisin ekkewe ra unumi, pwe repwe unumi pwe achechemenien chan Noum we, a surutiw rer; pwe repwe pwarata ngonuk, O Kot, Samach mi Napanap, pwe ir mi chechemeni i fansoun meinisin, pwe Ngunun epwe nonnom rer. Amen.
